co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.api.broadcast

Class EventBroadcastUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.api.broadcast.EventBroadcastUtil
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.SdkTags

    public class EventBroadcastUtil
extends java.lang.Object
implements co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.SdkTags
    This class is used to receive an mce event broadcast and to handle it using a given EventBroadcastHandler
    See Also:
    EventBroadcastHandler
